lead_paragraph: An article in some editions on Thursday about the Mets’ 8-2 victory over the Phillies misstated the score in the third inning when the Mets’ Mike Pelfrey stepped to the plate with his team in the lead. It was 2-1, not 3-1.
snippet: An article in some editions on Thursday about the Mets’ 8-2 victory over the Phillies misstated the score in the third inning when the Mets’ Mike Pelfrey stepped to the plate with his team in the lead. It was 2-1, not 3-1.
